products.name: Aspirin
products.description: Aspirin is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to treat pain, fever, and inflammation.

products.name: Amoxicillin
products.description: Amoxicillin is an antibiotic used to treat a wide variety of bacterial infections.

products.name: Loratadine
products.description: Loratadine is an antihistamine used to treat allergy symptoms such as sneezing, itching, and watery eyes.

products.name: Toothpaste
products.description: Toothpaste is a paste or gel used with a toothbrush to clean and maintain the health of teeth.

products.name: Shampoo
products.description: Shampoo is a hair care product used to clean and remove dirt, oil, and other impurities from hair.

products.name: Condoms
products.description: Condoms are barrier devices made of latex or polyurethane used to reduce the risk of sexually transmitted infections and unintended pregnancies.

products.name: Lubricant
products.description: Lubricant is a gel or liquid used to decrease friction and enhance comfort during sexual activity.

products.name: Pregnancy Test
products.description: A pregnancy test is a device used to determine whether a woman is pregnant by detecting the presence of human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) in urine.

products.name: Prenatal Vitamins
products.description: Prenatal vitamins are supplements containing essential nutrients for pregnant women, such as folic acid, iron, and calcium.

products.name: Nursing Pads
products.description: Nursing pads are absorbent pads worn inside a nursing bra to prevent milk leakage and keep the breast area dry.

products.name: Ibuprofen
products.description: Ibuprofen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever.

products.name: Acetaminophen
products.description: Acetaminophen is a pain reliever and fever reducer commonly used to treat headaches, muscle aches, and other minor pain.

products.name: Cetirizine
products.description: Cetirizine is an antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as sneezing, itching, and watery eyes.

products.name: Tums
products.description: Tums is an antacid used to treat heartburn, acid indigestion, and upset stomach.

products.name: Pepto-Bismol
products.description: Pepto-Bismol is an over-the-counter medication used to treat symptoms of an upset stomach, such as nausea, heartburn, and diarrhea.

products.name: Melatonin
products.description: Melatonin is a hormone supplement used to help regulate sleep cycles and improve sleep quality.

products.name: Mucinex
products.description: Mucinex is an expectorant used to thin and loosen mucus in the airways, making it easier to cough up and clear congestion.

products.name: Benadryl
products.description: Benadryl is an antihistamine used to treat allergy symptoms, such as sneezing, itching, and hives, as well as the common cold and motion sickness.

products.name: Naproxen
products.description: Naproxen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and lower fever.

products.name: Zinc Lozenges
products.description: Zinc lozenges are dietary supplements used to support immune system function and reduce the severity and duration of cold symptoms.

products.name: Antibacterial Hand Sanitizer
products.description: Antibacterial hand sanitizer is a liquid or gel used to kill germs and bacteria on the hands without the need for water or soap.

products.name: Deodorant
products.description: Deodorant is a personal care product applied to the underarms to help prevent body odor caused by the bacterial breakdown of perspiration.

products.name: Birth Control Pills
products.description: Birth control pills are oral contraceptives that contain hormones to prevent pregnancy by inhibiting ovulation and altering the lining of the uterus.

products.name: Spermicide
products.description: Spermicide is a contraceptive substance that destroys sperm, applied before intercourse to prevent pregnancy.

products.name: Stretch Mark Cream
products.description: Stretch mark cream is a topical product used to help prevent and reduce the appearance of stretch marks on the skin during and after pregnancy.

products.name: Belly Band
products.description: A belly band is a supportive garment worn during pregnancy to provide gentle compression and support to the abdomen and lower back.

products.name: Nipple Cream
products.description: Nipple cream is a topical product applied to the nipples to soothe and heal dry, cracked, or sore skin caused by breastfeeding.

products.name: Body Wash
products.description: Body wash is a liquid soap used for cleaning the body during bathing or showering.

products.name: Emergency Contraceptive
products.description: Emergency contraceptive is a medication used to prevent pregnancy after unprotected sex or contraceptive failure, such as a condom breaking.

products.name: Postpartum Support Belt
products.description: A postpartum support belt is a garment designed to provide support and compression to the abdominal muscles after childbirth, helping to alleviate pain and discomfort.

products.name: Mouthwash
products.description: Mouthwash is a liquid oral hygiene product used to kill germs, freshen breath, and reduce plaque and gingivitis.

products.name: Tampons
products.description: Tampons are absorbent feminine hygiene products inserted into the vagina during menstruation to absorb menstrual fluid.

products.name: Menstrual Cup
products.description: A menstrual cup is a reusable, bell-shaped feminine hygiene product made of medical-grade silicone, latex, or elastomer that is inserted into the vagina during menstruation to collect menstrual fluid.

products.name: Pads
products.description: Pads are absorbent feminine hygiene products worn in the underwear during menstruation to absorb menstrual fluid.

products.name: Diaphragm
products.description: A diaphragm is a shallow, dome-shaped silicone cup that is inserted into the vagina and covers the cervix, acting as a barrier to prevent sperm from reaching the uterus.

products.name: Floss
products.description: Floss is a dental hygiene product used to clean between the teeth and remove plaque and food particles.

products.name: Hair Conditioner
products.description: Hair conditioner is a hair care product applied after shampooing to improve the texture, manageability, and appearance of hair.

products.name: Dental Picks
products.description: Dental picks are oral hygiene tools used to clean between the teeth and remove plaque, food particles, and tartar.

products.name: Heating Pad
products.description: A heating pad is a therapeutic device that provides warmth and comfort to alleviate pain and discomfort associated with muscle strains, cramps, and injuries.

products.name: Cold Pack
products.description: A cold pack is a therapeutic device used to apply cold therapy to an injured area, helping to reduce inflammation, swelling, and pain.

products.name: Prenatal Support Belt
products.description: A prenatal support belt is a garment designed to provide support and relieve pain in the lower back and abdomen during pregnancy.

products.name: Maternity Pillow
products.description: A maternity pillow is a specially designed pillow to provide support and comfort to the body during pregnancy, helping to alleviate discomfort and promote better sleep.

products.name: Vaginal Moisturizer
products.description: Vaginal moisturizer is a personal lubricant used to alleviate vaginal dryness and discomfort during sexual activity.

products.name: Female Condom
products.description: A female condom is a pouch-like barrier device inserted into the vagina to help prevent the transmission of sexually transmitted infections and unintended pregnancies.

products.name: Shaving Cream
products.description: Shaving cream is a personal care product applied to the skin before shaving to provide lubrication, reduce irritation, and achieve a closer shave.

products.name: Razors
products.description: Razors are personal care devices with a sharp blade or multiple blades, used to remove body hair by shaving.

products.name: Toothpaste
products.description: Toothpaste is a gel or paste used with a toothbrush to clean and maintain the health of teeth and gums.

products.name: Shampoo
products.description: Shampoo is a hair care product used to clean and remove dirt, oil, and other impurities from the hair and scalp.

products.name: Insect Repellent
products.description: Insect repellent is a product applied to skin, clothing, or other surfaces to prevent insect bites and stings.

products.name: Sunscreen
products.description: Sunscreen is a lotion, spray, or gel that helps protect the skin from the sun's ultraviolet (UV) radiation, reducing the risk of sunburn and skin cancer.

products.name: Antifungal Cream
products.description: Antifungal cream is a topical medication used to treat fungal skin infections, such as athlete's foot, jock itch, and ringworm.

products.name: Pregnancy Test
products.description: A pregnancy test is an over-the-counter diagnostic device used to detect the presence of human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG), a hormone produced during pregnancy, in urine.

products.name: Ovulation Test
products.description: An ovulation test is an over-the-counter diagnostic device used to detect a surge in luteinizing hormone (LH), which typically occurs before ovulation, in urine.
